title: Grass Flow Direction
description: D4 Flow directions with Grass numbering (2=up, 4=left, 6=down, 8=right)

title: Flow Direction
description: D4 Flow Direcitons with the following numbering: 1=down, 2=left, 3=up, 4=right

title: Latent Heat Flux
description: latent heat flux from canopy height to atmosphere

title: ParFlow Run files
description: Run scripts and other model configuration files

title: Indicator file for subsufrace units in ParFlow
ParFlow Solid File
description: File to define a domain shape for Parflow

title: ParFlow Flow Barrier
description: File defining the depth to flow barier

title: Precipitation minus evaporation (net recharge)
description: Recharge forcing used for ParFlow spinups

title: Pressure Head
description: Map 3D grid point to pressure head

title: Steady State Pressure Head
description: Presssure head at the end of spinup

title: Pressure Head at the following timestep
Saturation
description: Map 3D grid point to saturation value

title: Sensible heat flux
description: sensible heat from canopy height to atmosphere

title: Slope x
description: Slope in the x direciton (Grid centered)

title: Slope y
description: Slope in the y direction (Grid centered)

title: Stream segment IDs
description: Stream segment ID numbers (0 values outside of stream)

title: Snow melt
description: Difference in SWE over a given time period

title: Van Genuchten Alpha
description: alpha parameter for van Genucten curve

title: Van Genuchten n
description: n parameter for van Genuchten curve

title: HUC map
description: Map of points to HUC ID

title: fractional distance from stream
description: Shortest distance of a given cell to a stream divided by the distance from the stream cell to the nearest topographic divide (Values range from 0-1)

title: Water Table Depth difference from normal
Snow Water Equivalent difference from normal
